vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function terms() external view returns (uint256 controlVariable, uint256 vestingTerm, uint256 minimumPrice, uint256 maxPayout, uint256 fee, uint256 maxDebt);
vulnerability_findings.message:
IOlympusBondDepository.terms.maxPayout (local variable @ IOlympusBondDepository.sol#38) shadows:
	- IOlympusBondDepository.maxPayout (function @ IOlympusBondDepository.sol#21)
